楽しむ、ただそれだけならやり続ければ楽しいゲームだと思います。
他の方も色々言われてる通りなのも事実のゲームです。

結果、人と遊ぶゲームなので十人十色の感想が出るゲームですので、他者との関わり合いに機敏な方はこのゲームはおすすめしません。
数人で遊ぶのが一番良いんじゃないかな？
遊び方はそれぞれでしょうから楽しめれば何も問題はないです。

負けても勝っても楽しく最後まで遊んでほしいですね。

Dead by Daylight is a great horror game. It's very fun to play and consists of four survivors trying to escape from one killer. You can choose between different survivors and perks to go with them as well as different killers with perks to go with them too. No level is the same since every time you play the maps are randomized menaing even when you're on the same map it will be set up different each time. This game is great, I haven't had any trouble with it since I've had it. If you have played Friday the 13th: The Game and liked it then you'll love this one.

我玩过40几款游戏，库里也有100+游戏，从没见过哪个游戏能跟这游戏一样，36MB的更新，要我预留40个G的磁盘空间，下载30秒完成，安装装NM半个小时，网上2019年年初就有说这个问题，特么2020年末了，还是这个B样，真有够恶心的，还有游戏内的匹配系统，真的是说你是屎都玷污了屎！！
至于游戏好不好玩，我直说了好玩，缺点我直说了，匹配烂，新手日常被爆干，更新慢，吃硬盘。

Dead By Daylight is a game with such immense potential in its' gameplay loop but it is severely held back by the developers. I supported the game for a very long time in the hopes that it would improve but with every step in the right direction, there were two steps backwards. Constant unprofessional handling of issues and bad game design choices just weigh it down too much to be consistently enjoyable. If the game ever get better, I would be happy to recommend it to anyone, but in it's current state I'd say it's only fun for a little while before the cracks really start to show.

Also, the new matchmaking is awful. Good luck having fun when you're getting matched with survivors on your team with 20 hours in play time vs. getting matched with sweaty meta teams as killer.

A Great Game Misunderstood By It's Player Base

Dead By Daylight AKA (DBD) is a team effort based game that matches up four survivors and one immortal killer. As the killer you must sacrifice all survivors by knocking them down and attaching them to hooks before they can wiggle free, which will then give a percentage of time until a almost cosmic creature called The Entity devours their souls. There are also other ways to kill the survivors with the hook. A Mori is what it's called which unlocks with special perks you can gain from a sorta limited point shop called The Bloodweb which you buy with Bloodpoints. A Mori allows you to kill a final staged survivor with your own weapon. No carrying anyone around involved, however a Mori is rarely used and hard to even get the chance to activate. As a survivor your goal is to repair five different generators, with about seven or eight generators you can use scattered out in the map. During a repair you must use what's called a skill check. A well timed space bar push essentially which will allow you to keep repairing without notifying the killer your position and at the same time lose generator progress. Skill checks are also used in healing your self and other players. As well as certain instances created by specific killers. After all generators are fixed you then open two to three gates that must be open in order to escape and be free from the killers grasp. There is also a hatch in the map that will allow a player to skip the generators entirely. However these hatches if found by the killer first can be closed. And are often a last second option. 


Game Play:
Dead By Daylight  Dead By Daylight is for sure one of the better online horror games out there. In which the idea of real fear is well implemented. You will find yourself screaming both sarcastically and typically for the real deal. As some killers such as Ghostface my personal killer main and favorite slasher film character has the ability for the heart rate radius (A tool used by the survivor that determines how near the killer is) Won't go off until severely close. The game has a decent amount of both original survivors and killers to choose from, while also giving access to famous horror characters such as Michael Myers , Leatherface and even The Executioner from Silent Hill. As well as survivors such as Laurie Strode and Ash from The Evil Dead. Dead By Daylight gives a large variety of customization which for some will cost real money but not everything. Dead By Daylight is a fantastic experience that will leave you wanting to play again. 

Player Base:
A very misjudged game by it's players. Some reviews complain about the game being addicting and that it was a waste of their time. Which honestly isn't really a reason to give a thumbs down review. I mean every game can be addicting, it's that it's fun which is what matters. I find media complaining about certain Killers such as Ghostface which one person stated. "Ghostface is a waste of money, the only thing you get by him is a crouch button." Well first of all the crouch button is actually insanely useful especially when your in his Shroud or Stealth Mode as most call it. Different killers are used for different play styles. I play a lot of stealth games and so Ghostface is perfect for me. But some may like the more rushed approach which would be The Hillbilly or Leatherface. If you play the game and enjoy it then there's no reason to put a dislike comment. There's some toxicity here and there. But really only if you get majorly involved in voice chat. Overall everyone is pretty silent but also cooperative. A little T-Bagging once in a while just to crack a laugh. But not typically. 

Developers:
All I can say is they shoot out content at least every month and don't give out false bans, that's all I would need from the developers. Kindness, A good game and paying attention to players.

Overall review
100/10 Highly recommend.

Note: There is not a lot of gore, worst thing honestly is some of the killer skins, that's about it. Mainly just decently mild blood. I'd recommend to parents 14-16 and up. Just because of it's theme but honestly no one really pays attention to ratings now days. As long as your kid knows murdering is not okay unless the extreme happens in extreme self defense. Otherwise I say go ahead.

It's a complex game to start off with, but give it a few games with some more experienced friends, and it can be a blast. Whereas, personally I'm not fond of the only game modes outside of custom games being ranked, it can still be a fun way to just pass time.

This game was fun, but has a serious issue of creative burnout. The killers that have come out recently share similar power traits with older killers, with small modifications. Nemesis power is not fun at all. I really hope they shake things up soon, maybe add an objective and be more creative with killer powers.

Já tinha visto várias transmissões de pessoas que jogaram esse jogo e sempre tive vontade de ter. Depois que lançaram a versão gratuita móvel eu passei a jogar, mas jogar no PC tem outro nível, muito mais interessante. Para quem gosta de um pouco de terror, recomendo!

Almost 95 hours of pure killer play time. I do love this game, but it also really pissed me off to the point of deleting it. Though, I did reinstall it and have played almost 75 hours since then. People get really good, really quick, and simple things for killers like getting the cannibal for his BBQ and Chili perk are something you should know going into this game (speaking for those whom find killers more interesting for play like I did). This game does feel really rewarding once you've stepped up your game and got a clue as to whatever role you choose to play.

This game is the great and i love playing it. I love playing leatherface with insideous facecamping. It is my favorite thing to do and i do it every game just about. I have probably played 30 hours of insideous leatherface and i highly recommend it to anyone who wants to have fun playing this game. It is just a great way to relieve some stress about toxic people in the game. Got a 4 man in discord flaming and Tbagin you? Insideous leatherface will fix that. Just great for almost all counters; great for noobs.

[b][i]I have played this game for more than 1500 hours and this is the first game which I have played so much because there is a lot of fun in this game. This game is 100% recommended by me![/i]

➤ In my opinion, this game is one of the best multiplayer horror games.
➤ Some people say that this game has the same content but it is not at all because you can play as different killers or survivors by purchasing the DLCs, and the way of playing as all killers are different.

[i]- This game is good but has the worst system-[/i]
➤ Don't play this game if your network is slow.
➤The matchmaking is very bad, if you are a new player or if your rank is low, you may face high ranked players.
➤ If you get disconnected during the match then you will not be able to join back in the same match. Also, if you be disconnected several times during a match then you can get a ban from 10 minutes to 24 hours, even more(This ban is imposed for those who leave the game during the match so that they do not make the mistake of leaving a match next time.).
➤ Game is buggy, the developers of this game try their best to remove the bugs but they put new bugs instead of removing the bugs.

[i]-My rating for this game is 7/10[/i]
[i]-If you don't have any problem with these then you can play this game.[/i]
